price: 31. (Xus) marka loo soo bandhigay goor galab ah (fardo) sugan markay taagan yihiin, dheereeya markay ordayaan -
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
